facebook.com.reason: Heavy bot protection requires stealth mode

instagram.com.reason: Social media platform with strong anti-bot

tiktok.com.reason: Short-form video platform with aggressive bot detection

youtube.com.reason: Video platform with moderate anti-bot measures

reddit.com.reason: Social forum with rate limiting and bot detection

amazon.com.reason: E-commerce platform with sophisticated bot protection

glassdoor.com.reason: Job site with access restrictions and bot detection

indeed.com.reason: Job search platform with moderate protection

medium.com.reason: Content platform with paywall and bot detection

pinterest.com.reason: Visual discovery platform with bot protection

tripadvisor.com.reason: Review site with moderate anti-bot measures

metadata.description: Difficult website domains and their recommended anti-bot escalation levels

levels.0: Basic - Basic SERP API and simple crawl
levels.2: Advanced - Advanced proxy rotation + browser automation
levels.3: Stealth - Stealth mode with full browser simulation
